content: Just past the lantern decorations, you'll encounter a new enemy: the Beetle Captain. These foes are tougher than the others in this area, and move deftly with twin swords for dual slashes or pincer-like stab attacks. They can also rapidly reorient themselves by flying backward after an attack, but you can Immobilize them to keep the foe pinned down.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow'.
The content is as follows:
Just past the lantern decorations, you'll encounter a new enemy: the Beetle Captain. These foes are tougher than the others in this area, and move deftly with twin swords for dual slashes or pincer-like stab attacks. They can also rapidly reorient themselves by flying backward after an attack, but you can Immobilize them to keep the foe pinned down.
